Info Blocks

Info blocks can be used to highlight and organize information into modular content that easy to read and navigate.

Example:

Job Opportunities

CalCareers

Curabitur ut augue at mi eleifend lobortis. Ut tincidunt lacinia nisi pharetra. In cursus urna vel tempus imperdiet.

Apply Today

State Training

Training Center

Curabitur ut augue at mi eleifend lobortis. Ut tincidunt lacinia nisi pharetra. In cursus urna vel tempus imperdiet.

Enroll Today

State Services

California State

Curabitur ut augue at mi eleifend lobortis. Ut tincidunt lacinia nisi pharetra. In cursus urna vel tempus imperdiet.

Find Out More
